LoanApplicantIncome.name: LoanApplicantIncome
LoanApplicantIncome.description: Represents details about the borrower and co-borrower current monthly income.

IncomeExtIdentifier.description: ID that uniquely identifies imported data in an external data source (if applicable). This field is unique within your organization.

IncomeSourceType.description: Source of borrower's monthly non-employment income.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LoanApplicantId.description: ID of the borrower associated with this income.

LoanApplicationId.description: ID of the loan application associated with this income or expense.

MonthlyIncomeAmount.description: Amount of the borrower's monthly non-employment income from this source.

Name.description: Name of the other monthly income.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who owns this record.
